disruptions.reason: Bakerloo Line: Severe delays between Queen's Park and Harrow & Wealdstone while we fix a Signal failure at Willesden Junction. GOOD SERVICE on the rest of the line.
Central Line: Minor delays due to train cancellations.
Circle Line: No service clockwise only while we fix a signal failure at Gloucester Road. GOOD SERVICE in the anti-clockwise direction.
Jubilee Line: Minor delays due to train cancellations.

London Overground: No service Euston to Watford Junction while we fix a signal failure at Carpenters Park and due to the temporary unavailability of train operators. No service Barking Riverside to Barking while we fix a signal failure at Barking. SEVERE DELAYS Barking to Gospel Oak due to the temporary unavailability of train operators. Severe delays Stratford to Clapham Junction/Richmond due to the temporary unavailability of train operators.

Metropolitan Line: Minor delays while we fix signal failures at Wembley Park and Chorleywood.
Northern Line: Severe delays due to an earlier fire alert at Tottenham Court Road. London Underground tickets will be accepted on local bus services.
Piccadilly Line: Severe delays Acton Town to Uxbridge due to train cancellations and a signal failure at South Ealing. MINOR DELAYS on the rest of the line.
